snippet: Edward J. Snowden appealed to Washington in a letter he gave to Hans-Christian Ströbele, a veteran member of the Green Party in the German Parliament.
lead_paragraph: Edward J. Snowden appealed to Washington in a letter he gave to Hans-Christian Ströbele, a veteran member of the Green Party in the German Parliament.
